title: The Day Jimmy's boa ate the wash
brief_description: A girl relates to her mother the bizarre chain of events that occurred as a result of Jimmy’s pet boa constrictor escaping during a class trip to a farm. Based on the book by Trinka Hakes Noble, illustrated by Steven Kellogg.
